dcterms:title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack
dcterms:creator: Various Artists (including Beck, Metric, Broken Social Scene, Frank Black)
dcterms:contributor: Edgar Wright (music supervision); Nigel Godrich (score producer)
dcterms:subject: Film; Soundtrack; Alternative Rock; Scott Pilgrim
dcterms:description: Official soundtrack album for the 2010 film 'Scott Pilgrim vs. the World', featuring original songs by Sex Bob-Omb (written by Beck), tracks by Metric, Broken Social Scene, Frank Black and others, as well as music used throughout the movie.

dctermsisDerivativeOf: Scott Pilgrim graphic novel series; Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (screenplay)
